title: Words can’t capture the experience.
text: Attended the Acropolis on October 10, 2019 and the memory will forever be seared into my brain like a Greek lamb chop. The view and ancient ruins are absolutely breath taking. This is a must see experience. Step back and take in the ancient ruins also known as the cradle of western civilization

title: They’ll pack your belly with meat
text: This quaint little restaurant is located no more than a five minute walk from the Marriott in Athens. The cuisine was so delicious I’m sure Athena herself would have eaten there. The prices were very reasonable. From the looks of things, it’s a real local hotspot! I recommend the mixed meat order. The food is served family style.

title: A vacation of a lifetime
text: I stayed here with a group of friends for several days. The resort is breath taking. I can’t say enough good things about the staff. They literally bend over backwards to cater to your every need. It lived up to its reputation for being one of the nicest resorts in Mikonos.
place: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos

title: Good coffee and good location
text: If you’re looking to catch a quick caffeine buzz, this is the place. The first coffee boutique you’ll see in the downtown when you get off the train station and let me tell you, look no further.
